data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the county of Hisar, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Hisar, Haryana, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Hisar, Haryana, India. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Hisar, Haryana, India.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 1,743,900 people living in the county of Hisar.
Father, encourage the 19,183 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Raigar people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Lord, we pray for the believers in Hisar, Haryana, India to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Hisar who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the county of Hisar, Haryana, India has a population of 1,743,900.

We estimate Hisar has 19,183 people who might know Jesus, 21,159 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,703,558 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,703,558 who are far from you in Hisar, Haryana, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.
